I also wanted to see wth I was looking at and I feel like wearing normal sunglasses indoors looks “suspicious”.  As you can see in mine and many other reviewers pictures you can practically see my eyes behind the lenses making it perfect for all my needs! I have a pretty narrow/slim face and I wish it fit my face a lil better but the glasses itself look and feel great. And it’s light and comfortable! Doesn’t put any hard pressure on the sides of my head. Highly recommend the C13’s!

评论详情: Frankly, I love these glasses. They are a bit larger, and angular; which makes my large head happy, but can often be difficult to pull off. They are lightweight and comfortable enough for me to position them as my "everyday pair" of glasses (kept in my center console for long car rides up/down the grapevine). They feel sturdy, and I find them to be durable enough to warrant little concern about how long they will last. They come with a fittingly large—and durable—case, which is nice.

类型: Color: C13 Crystal Gray Frame/Blue Tinted LensLens Width: 52 Millimeters
评论详情: I don't usually have high expectations for "plastic" sunglasses as they often scratch and break so easily, but these are made of TR90, which is more durable, flexible and lightweight and it really shows. These arrived in pristine condition, not. a mark or scratch on them and they almost looked like they were made of glass.  The smoky gray frames with blue lenses really compliment each other and the packaging & accessories are incredible; nice solid outer gift box, cleaning cloth, silk like bag and the pièce de résistance, a sturdy leather hard case with a carabiner attached to hook it to your belt loop or a bag. If I had received these as a gift from someone, I'd have thought they were two to three times more expensive than what they go for. I'm actually going to buy a few more to have on hand to give as gifts if I forget someone's birthday. A solid purchase!

The tinted lenses not only provide excellent UV protection but also add a cool, retro vibe to any ensemble. Constructed with durable materials, these sunglasses ensure both style and functionality. 评论详情: The Gtand Vintage Retro Sunglasses exceeded my expectations in both style and design. They are impressively stylish, with a celebrity-inspired look that's even more striking in person.  The UV protection is surprisingly effective, especially given the light blue tint of the lenses. This tint not only adds a stylish flair but also enhances the vibrancy and pop of the world around me.  Despite their lightweight feel, which initially gave an impression of flimsiness, the sunglasses are incredibly comfortable and durable. They're so light that wearing them is a breeze. 评论概述: Built well, clear lenses, exceptional value!
类型: Color: C12 Crystal Gray Frame/Gray LensLens Width: 52 Millimeters
评论详情: Wow, stylish, made well and loaded with decent accessories! I must say, I thought these looked nice before purchasing but they are even better than I expected.  The high gloss on these light weight frames is impressive! The lenses are very good with maybe the slightest haziness to them but overall no complaints at this price point. The hinges work well, tight but not too tight and these glasses sit straight on my face, not lopsided. I would however prefer they had a slight inward bend (toward my face) at the nose piece. These frames are straight as a board across the bridge, rather than contoured inward.  Packaging on these is impressive, Apple like almost, with a neat little pull tab and drawer style box. You get a felt lined semi/hard case with carabiner clip, a glasses bag and cleaning cloth.  These things exude style, are built well, are packaged well and come with a multitude of accessories and you get all that at an exceptional value. I will certainly keep this brand in my sights and highly recommend these...Well done!

类型: Color: C09 Black Frame/Green Tinted LensLens Width: 52 Millimeters
评论详情: These square retro vintage sunglasses by GTAND are an amazing value, and come in a host of unique and fun tints, as well as frame colors. The width of these sunglasses is 145mm, and these fit my larger sized head well. The temple length is 145mm, and will work for small, medium, and large head sizes.  The construction of these frames is a glossy black plastic, and feels about average in quality. But these glasses have all metal and pro styled hardware that really gives these sunglasses a more high end look, and performance. The tinted lenses (I choose green) are very clear to look through, and have no noticeable distorting one might expect from lower priced sunglasses.  A big added bonus with this purchase is the designer box, glass sheaths, and glass case that comes along with these sunglasses. The case quality I would expect from a high end sunglass manufacturer, but you get that great quality here!!!!  Well done, and great shades, and great value!!!!

类型: Color: C13 Crystal Gray Frame/Blue Tinted LensLens Width: 52 Millimeters
评论详情: I absolutely adore these shades. Not only do they look like something a movie star would be seen wearing, they’re of such a high quality. First, the frames. They’re thick, sturdy, and definitely not too loose. As you can see, I have a wider shaped head and they fit snug enough to where they won’t fall off too easily. I can see with proper care, these sunglasses should last several years.  The lenses are equally stunning, strikingly tinted on the inside. They block the sun, but I can still see things outside without any obstruction.  They arrive in a standard glasses case and its own cleaning cloth—something I have a million of because I collect sunglasses. What I find useful, is the carabiner keychain attached to the case which makes them quite portable. What a genius idea!! All this to say, these shades are extremely gift worthy. But you’ll want to buy two pairs so there’s one for yourself.  5 “Cool” Stars from me, without hesitation.
